name: medichamite
effect: Held: Allows Medicham to Mega Evolve into Mega Medicham.
short_effect: Held: Allows Medicham to Mega Evolve into Mega Medicham.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Medicham hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
